channel.title: The Runescape Pure Team
channel.description:
Well, I know a lot of people have been making pures etc etc, So I was wondering if we could make like a clan of them?
We could have similar names, same stats, same quests all that good stuff! :)
edit: just post your username if you want to join :D
Current Clan:
Me: Rs-username: Pessimistic Wet Dreamss: Rs-username: ClearTheBong

We could have similar names, same stats, same quests all that good stuff! :)[/quote]

item.title: The Runescape Pure Team

item.description:
@Aff wrote:

wat bout 20 def pures
[/quote]
most of us won’t be able to afford turm(assuming thats what 20 def is for) but if you have 20 defence already go ahead :P[/quote]

turm is 28 def; 30 def is turm + rune gloves + prossy
